fields_of_interest: Education and training, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: - Currently we're part of the High-Level Group on Fake News and online disinformation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: - High-Level Group on Fake News and online disinformation
goals__remit:
Maldita.es aims to fight against misinformation and "fake news" through Maldita's section "MALDITO BULO" using the following strategy: 
 
1- Easy to share images debunking misinformation for use in social networks and messaging applications.  
 
2- Context-oriented articles debunking misinformation, published in Maldita.es with Google's Claim Review technology.  
 
3- A chrome extensions and soon-to-be different applications for a proactive approach to misinformation.
